Paid Clicks increased 18 percent for the company in the quarter, while cost-per click increased 4 percent. Google said that international revenues totaled$ 4.38 billion, 52 percent of total revenue for the quarter. Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy, continuous product innovation that benefits both users and advertisers, and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, said Eric Schmidt , CEO of Google.`` These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth-- investments that will benefit our users, Google and the wider web.'' boo artists off the stage at any time during their act. Simon Cowell .`` This is a famous and infamous audience,'' says Marion J. Caffey , the Amateur Night producer who hand-picks the talent. We have judges, but they only judge the response of the audience. A lot of other shows have judges who make that final decision, and they overrule the audience about who stays and who goes.`` At the Apollo, however, the crowd actually does the hiring and the firing, and they get pretty wild. upon Michael Vick PUBLISHED 35 minutes and 43 seconds ago White Sox pitcher Mark Buehrle says he and his wife sometimes rooted for Eagles quarterback Michael Vick to be injured as payback for Michael Vick 's mistreatment of dogs. He had a great year and a great comeback, but there were times where we watched the game and I know it's bad to say, but there were times where we hope he gets hurt, Mark Buehrle told MLB.com, according to the Chicago Tribune.`` Everything you've done to these dogs, something bad needs to happen to these guys.''
